name: Bulbasaur
description: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.

name: Ivysaur
description: The bulb on its back grows as it absorbs nutrients. The bulb gives off a pleasant aroma when it blooms.

name: Venusaur
description: It is able to convert sunlight into energy. As a result, it is more powerful in the summertime.

name: Charmander
description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Charizard
description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
description: Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this POKéMONs toughness in battle.

name: Blastoise
description: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

name: Caterpie
description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.

name: Metapod
description: This is its pre-evolved form. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.

name: Butterfree
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.

name: Kakuna
description: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

name: Beedrill
description: It can take down any opponent with its powerful poi son stingers. It sometimes attacks in swarms.

name: Pidgey
description: It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

name: Pidgeotto
description: PIDGEOTTO claims a large area as its own territory. This POKéMON flies around, patrolling its living space. If its territory is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

name: Pidgeot
description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

name: Rattata
description: It eats anything. Wherever food is available, it will settle down and produce offspring continuously.

name: Raticate
description: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.

name: Spearow
description: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

name: Fearow
description: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

name: Ekans
description: It flutters the tip of its tongue to seek out the scent of prey, then swallows the prey whole.

name: Arbok
description: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

name: Pikachu
description: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.

name: Raichu
description: If the electric pouches in its cheeks become fully charged, both ears will stand straight up.

name: Sandshrew
description: To protect itself from attackers, it curls up into a ball. It lives in arid regions with minimal rainfall.

name: Sandslash
description: Adept at climbing trees, it rolls into a spiny ball, then attacks its enemies from above.

name: NidoranF
description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: Nidorina
description: When NIDORINA are with their friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. This POKéMON appears to become nervous if separated from the others.

name: Nidoqueen
description: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

name: NidoranM
description: It is small, but its horn is filled with poison. It charges then stabs with the horn to inject poison.

name: Nidorino
description: Quick to anger, it stabs enemies with its horn to inject a powerful poison when it becomes agitated.

name: Nidoking
description: Its tail is thick and powerful. If it binds an enemy, it can snap the victim's spine quite easily.

name: Clefairy
description: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.

name: Clefable
description: With its acute hearing, it can pick up sounds from far away. It usually hides in quiet places.

name: Vulpix
description: If it is attacked by an enemy that is stronger than itself, it feigns injury to fool the enemy and escapes.

name: Ninetales
description: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.

name: Jigglypuff
description: When this POKéMON sings, it never pauses to breathe. If it is in a battle against an opponent that does not easily fall asleep, JIGGLYPUFF cannot breathe, endangering its life.

name: Wigglytuff
description: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

name: Zubat
description: ZUBAT avoids sunlight because exposure causes it to become unhealthy. During the daytime, it stays in caves or under the eaves of old houses, sleeping while hanging upside down.

name: Golbat
description: It can drink more than 10 ounces of blood at once. If it has too much, it gets heavy and flies clumsily.

name: Oddish
description: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

name: Gloom
description: GLOOM releases a foul fragrance from the pistil of its flower. When faced with danger, the stench worsens. If this POKéMON is feeling calm and secure, it does not release its usual stinky aroma.

name: Vileplume
description: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
description: PARAS has parasitic mushrooms growing on its back called tochukaso. They grow large by drawing nutrients from the BUG POKéMON host. They are highly valued as a medicine for extending life.

name: Parasect
description: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mush room spores it scatters.

name: Venonat
description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

name: Venomoth
description: It flutters its wings to scatter dustlike scales. The scales leach toxins if they contact skin.

name: Diglett
description: If a DIGLETT DIGS through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.

name: Dugtrio
description: Its three heads move alternately, driving it through tough soil to depths of over 60 miles.

name: Meowth
description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

name: Persian
description: Many adore it for its sophisticated air. However, it will lash out and scratch for little reason.

name: Psyduck
description: When headaches stimulate its brain cells, which are usually inactive, it can use a mysterious power.

name: Golduck
description: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

name: Mankey
description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

name: Primeape
description: When it becomes furious, its blood circulation becomes more robust, and its muscles are made stronger. But it also becomes much less intelligent.

name: Growlithe
description: A POKéMON with a friendly nature. However, it will bark fiercely at anything invading its territory.

name: Arcanine
description: This legendary Chinese POKéMON is considered magnificent. Many people are enchanted by its grand mane.

name: Poliwag
description: It is possible to see this POKéMONs spiral innards right through its thin skin. However, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.

name: Poliwhirl
description: The surface of POLIWHIRLs body is always wet and slick with an oily fluid. Because of this greasy covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.

name: Poliwrath
description: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: Abra
description: It hypnotizes itself so that it can teleport away when it senses danger, even if it is asleep.

name: Kadabra
description: It possesses strong spiritual power. The more danger it faces, the stronger its psychic power.

name: Alakazam
description: The spoons clutched in its hands are said to have been created by its psychic powers.

name: Machop
description: It loves to work out and build its muscles. It is never satisfied, even if it trains hard all day long.

name: Machoke
description: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this POKéMON would be unstoppable.

name: Machamp
description: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this POKéMON fires off awesome punches.

name: Bellsprout
description: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny insects with its vines and devours them.

name: Weepinbell
description: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.

name: Victreebel
description: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is melted in a day, bones and all.

name: Tentacool
description: When the tide goes out, dehydrated TENTACOOL remains can be found washed up on the shore.

name: Tentacruel
description: TENTACRUEL has large red orbs on its head. The orbs glow before lashing the vicinity with a harsh ultrasonic blast. This POKéMONs outburst creates rough waves around it.

name: Geodude
description: Most people may not notice, but a closer look should reveal that there are many GEODUDE around.

name: Graveler
description: It rolls on mountain paths to move. Once it builds momentum, no Pokémon can stop it without difficulty.

name: Golem
description: It is capable of blowing itself up. It uses this explosive force to jump from mountain to mountain.

name: Ponyta
description: It is a weak runner immediately after birth. It gradually becomes faster by chasing after its parents.

name: Rapidash
description: Just loves to run. If it sees some thing faster than itself, it will give chase at top speed.

name: Slowpoke
description: A sweet sap leaks from its tail's tip. Although not nutritious, the tail is pleasant to chew on.

name: Slowbro
description: Naturally dull to begin with, it lost its ability to feel pain due to SHELLDERs seeping poison.

name: Magnemite
description: The units at its sides are extremely powerful magnets. They generate enough magnetism to draw in iron objects from over 300 feet away.

name: Magneton
description: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: Farfetchd
description: It is always seen with a stick from a plant. Apparently, there are good sticks and bad sticks. This POKéMON occasionally fights with others over choice sticks.

name: Doduo
description: DODUOs two heads never sleep at the same time. Its two heads take turns sleeping, so one head can always keep watch for enemies while the other one sleeps.

name: Dodrio
description: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

name: Seel
description: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

name: Dewgong
description: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

name: Grimer
description: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: Muk
description: They love to gather in smelly areas where sludge accumulates, making the stench around them worse.

name: Shellder
description: It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.

name: Cloyster
description: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

name: Gastly
description: This POKéMON's body is 95% made up of gases, which are blown away by strong gusts of wind.

name: Haunter
description: In total darkness, where nothing is visible, HAUNTER lurks, silently stalking its next victim.

name: Gengar
description: The leer that floats in darkness belongs to a GENGAR delighting in casting curses on people.

name: Onix
description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.

name: Drowzee
description: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

name: Hypno
description: HYPNO holds a pendulum in its hand. The arcing movement and glitter of the pendulum lull the foe into a deep state of hypnosis. While this POKéMON searches for prey, it polishes the pendulum.

name: Krabby
description: KRABBY live on beaches, burrowed inside holes dug into the sand. On sandy beaches with little in the way of food, these POKéMON can be seen squabbling with each other over territory.

name: Kingler
description: It can hardly lift its massive, overgrown pincer. The pincer's size makes it difficult to aim properly.

name: Voltorb
description: It was discovered when POKéBALLS were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.

name: Electrode
description: It stores an over flowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.

name: Exeggcute
description: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

name: Exeggutor
description: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

name: Cubone
description: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.

name: Marowak
description: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

name: Hitmonlee
description: Its legs freely stretch and contract. Using these springlike limbs, it bowls over foes with devastating kicks. After battle, it rubs down its tired legs.

name: Hitmonchan
description: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

name: Lickitung
description: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to anything, so it is very useful.

name: Koffing
description: If KOFFING becomes agitated, it raises the toxicity of its internal gases and jets them out from all over its body. This POKéMON may also overinflate its round body, then explode.

name: Weezing
description: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Strong, but not too bright, this POKéMON can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging TACKLES.

name: Rhydon
description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

name: Chansey
description: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

name: Tangela
description: It is shrouded by blue vines. No one has seen the face hidden behind this growth of vines.

name: Kangaskhan
description: Raises its young in its belly pouch. Won't run from any fight to keep its young protected.

name: Horsea
description: If attacked by a larger enemy, it quickly swims to safety by adeptly controlling its well-developed dorsal fin.

name: Seadra
description: SEADRA sleeps after wriggling itself between the branches of coral. Those trying to harvest coral are occasionally stung by this POKéMONs poison barbs if they fail to notice it.

name: Goldeen
description: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

name: Seaking
description: In the autumn, SEAKING males can be seen performing courtship dances in riverbeds to woo females. During this season, this POKéMONs body coloration is at its most beautiful.

name: Staryu
description: As long as the center section is unharmed, it can grow back fully even if it is chopped to bits.

name: Starmie
description: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.

name: Mr Mime
description: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.

name: Scyther
description: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

name: Jynx
description: A JYNX sashays rhythmically as if it were dancing. Its motions are so bouncingly alluring, people seeing it are compelled to shake their hips without noticing.

name: Electabuzz
description: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

name: Magmar
description: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

name: Pinsir
description: PINSIR is astoundingly strong. It can grip a foe weighing twice its weight in its horns and easily lift it. This POKéMONs movements turn sluggish in cold places.

name: Tauros
description: These violent POKéMON fight with other members of their herd in order to prove their strength.

name: Magikarp
description: Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers and shallow puddles.

name: Gyarados
description: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The HYPER BEAM it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.

name: Lapras
description: A POKéMON that has been over hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

name: Ditto
description: A DITTO rearranges its cell structure to transform itself. However, if it tries to change based on its memory, it will get details wrong.

name: Eevee
description: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

name: Vaporeon
description: When VAPOREON's fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.

name: Jolteon
description: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.

name: Flareon
description: It has a flame chamber inside its body. It inhales, then blows out fire that is over 3,000F degrees.

name: Porygon
description: A man-made Pokémon created using advanced scientific means. It can move freely in cyberspace.

name: Omanyte
description: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically regenerated from fossils.

name: Omastar
description: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

name: Kabuto
description: It is thought to have inhabited beaches 300 million years ago. It is protected by a stiff shell.

name: Kabutops
description: KABUTOPS once swam underwater to hunt for prey. It was apparently evolving from being a water dweller to living on land as evident from changes in its gills and legs.

name: Aerodactyl
description: A savage POKéMON that died out in ancient times. It was resurrected using DNA taken from amber.

name: Snorlax
description: Its stomach can digest any kind of food, even if it happens to be moldy or rotten.

name: Articuno
description: The magnificent, seemingly translucent wings of this legendary bird POKéMON are said to be made of ice.

name: Zapdos
description: This legendary bird POKéMON is said to appear only when a thundercloud parts into two halves.

name: Moltres
description: One of the legendary bird POKéMON. Those seeing it are overwhelmed by its orange wings that seem to be on fire.

name: Dratini
description: This POKéMON is full of life energy. It continually sheds its skin and grows steadily larger.

name: Dragonair
description: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

name: Dragonite
description: It can fly in spite of its big and bulky physique. It circles the globe in just 16 hours.

name: Mewtwo
description: Because its battle abilities were raised to the ultimate level, it thinks only of defeating its foes.

name: Mew
description: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
